thought: To craft gray_wool, I need to craft gray_dye. Gray_dye requires placing 1 white_dye and 1 black_dye side by side in the crafting table. I have 1 ink_sac in slot 34, which I can use to craft 1 black_dye. I will first move the ink_sac into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1
